name: Death's Envoy
description:
Death's Envoy is a tiny game made for the TPS Game Jam #05 from the 21st of August til the 28th of August. 

The theme of the game-jam is "Death helps you."  Though we've decided to help Death instead. An average opossum has been chosen by the Death itself to complete an important mission - help Death reclaim what belongs to it - the soul of a dying man. 

Since there's an opossum involved, it can't be conventional and civil, right? Ready for chaos?

Our team: 
apatetite.itch.io - art
dev742.itch.io - coding && tech (and bugs of course)
